meanings.sent1: The dabbers at the dance competition showed off their moves.
meanings.sent2: The dabbers in the park were practicing their dance routines.
meanings.sent3: The dabbers decided to have a dab-off to see who was the best dancer.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the queen of dabbers, always impressing with her dance skills.
meanings.sent5: The group of dabbers amazed the audience with their synchronized performance.

meanings.definition: A tool used for applying small amounts of a substance.
meanings.sent1: The artist used dabbers to carefully apply paint to the canvas.
meanings.sent2: The chef used dabbers to add just the right amount of sauce to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The dabbers made it easy for the painter to create intricate designs.
meanings.sent4: Her precision with the dabbers was like that of a skilled surgeon.
meanings.sent5: The dabbers allowed for precise and controlled application of the substance.

meanings.definition: A device used for marking numbers on a bingo card.
meanings.sent1: The bingo players each had their own dabbers to mark the numbers.
meanings.sent2: The colorful dabbers added a fun element to the bingo game.
meanings.sent3: The dabbers were so popular that they ran out of them at the bingo hall.
meanings.sent4: She won the bingo game thanks to her lucky dabber.
meanings.sent5: The dabbers clicked happily as the numbers were marked on the cards.
